title: InkCPP
description: A C++ native runtime with Blueprint Interface for the inkle ink story language.
longDescription:
InkCPP provides an efficient C++ runtime for inkle's ink story scripting language.

The Blueprints provide various helper functions to make usage of ink large feature set as easy as possible.


  • Documentation
  • Example Project
  • Example Project Description


If you encounter any problems or ideas for improvement, please open an issue on GitHub https://github.com/JBenda/inkcpp/issues
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Imports `.ink.json` and `.ink` files as assets
  •  supports all ink features
  •  support multiple threads in the same runtime
  • get/set/observe global variables
  • bind external functions
  • yield and/or prioritize execution of different threads in same runtime
  • supports UEnum ↔ InkList mapping to ease working with lists
  • Wrapper for UEnum ↔ tag mapping
  • supports tag functions

Code Modules:

  •  inkcpp (Runtime)
  •  inkcpp-editor (Editor)

Number of Blueprints: 10

Number of C++ classes: 0

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64, Linux, MacOS

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64, Linux and MacOS are tested

The plugin is C++ native and should work on any platform.

Documentation: https://jbenda.github.io/inkcpp/html/group__unreal.html#ue_example

Example Project: https://jbenda.github.io/inkcpp/unreal/InkCPP_DEMO.zip

Important/Additional Notes:
